title: Online Collaborative Learning Course for Enhancing Animal Behavior and Welfare Attitudes (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational theories in animal behavior and welfare
context.additional_context: Responsive content design considering smartphone environments for in-service practitioners, with project-based assessment application.

learning_goals: Learners can explain five animal welfare standards and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can utilize three animal behavior analysis frameworks through collaborative discussion activities.
Learners can propose animal welfare improvement measures in team projects and create presentation materials based on evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
